Man-at-arms020346rsw6iany072ans5khckuph8vdrlqc1x1633592014-10-31T04:22:25ZGourgeist5433366[[File:Lannister_soldier.png|thumb|100px|A [[House Lannister|Lannister]] soldier.]]
A '''man-at-arms''' is a common man serving a [[noble house]] or lord as soldier. Unlike [[Knighthood|knights]], men-at-arms have not taken special vows and are still consideredÂ [[smallfolk]]. Knights therefore outrank men-at-arms and command them in battle.

== Known men-at-arms ==
* {[[Heward]]}, a man-at-arms sworn to [[House Stark]]. Killed by [[House Lannister|Lannister]] men-at-arms during [[Jaime Lannister]]'s attack against [[Eddard Stark|Ned Stark]].
* {[[Wyl (House Stark)|Wyl]]}, a man-at-arms sworn to House Stark. Killed by Lannister men-at-arms during Jaime Lannister's attack against Ned Stark.
* {[[Varly]]}, a man-at-arms sworn to House Stark. Killed during the [[Massacre in the Red Keep|purge]] of the Stark household.
* [[Tomard]], a man-at-arms sworn to House Stark.
* [[Jacks]], a man-at-arms sworn to House Stark.
* [[Quent]], a man-at-arms sworn to House Stark.
* {[[Tom]]}, a man-at-arms sworn to House Stark. Killed by [[Brienne]] for raping and murdering Riverlands women that collaborated with Lannister soldiers.
* {[[Kurleket]]}, a man-at-arms sworn to [[House Bracken]], killed by member of the [[Hill tribes]] at the [[Mountains of the Moon]].
* {[[Polliver]]}, a man-at-arms fighting for [[House Lannister]], serving under Ser [[Amory Lorch]] and Ser [[Gregor Clegane]]. Killed by [[Arya Stark]].
* [[Jaqen H'ghar]], a [[Lorath]]i criminal and former recruit of the [[Night's Watch]], voluntarily enlisted into the Lannister army; actually a [[Faceless Man]]. Deserted after aiding [[Arya Stark]] escape from [[Harrenhal]].
* {[[Rorge]]}, a criminal and former recruit of the Night's Watch, voluntarily enlisted into the Lannister army. Killed by [[Arya Stark]].
* {[[Biter]]}, a criminal and former recruit of the Night's Watch, voluntarily enlisted into the Lannister army. Killed by [[the Hound]].
* {[[Lowell]]}, a Lannister man-at-arms serving alongside Polliver. Killed by [[Sandor Clegane|the Hound]].
* [[Morgan]], a Lannister man-at-arms based at [[King's Landing]].
